com.qmetry.qaf.automation.core

Class QAFTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qmetry.qaf.automation.core.QAFTestBase

  • public class QAFTestBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides uiDriver, assertion and verification service at test level To add command custom listeners To run web browser with suffix "driver" for example, firefoxDriver, firefoxDriver
    To run tests which developed using web-driver api on RC provide rc supported browser string with suffix "_driver"
    for example, *firefox_driver
    Author:
    chirag
